subject: Pedal haptics just stop, and then it won't stop vibrating. How can I help?
description_text:
My Simsonn pedal haptic feedback devices tend to go crazy and stop working.
I'm using SimHub to control them, and I'm playing Assetto Corsa. What
information do you need for me to help fix this? It was doing this with
the plastic versions, but now I'm using the Pro versions with billet
aluminum bodies with the linear actuators, but they still go crazy and die.
At this very moment my brake pedal is still pulsing even after I've closed
the application. Is there a log file that I can send to you guys to help
you? I just need my pedal haptics to work correctly because I can't race
without them. Don't make me sell this rig and go back to full time real
life racing. It's a bitch, so I'll help however I can. Tell me how to send
you logs so that we can fix this.

conversations.body_text: Hi J W,    Please first make sure that your software is the latest version, SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2, and that the pedal firmware is CPU1: 2.0.5, CPU2: 2.0.4. Also, ensure the USB is connected to the USB 3.0 (blue) port on the back of your computer, and avoid using a USB hub.  Additionally, you can refer to the link below, which mainly involves connecting the computer case to the pedal stand with wires, and then connecting any metal screw on the pedal stand to our PlusX control box. This helps resolve interference caused by the computer or stand not being properly grounded.     https://github.com/SHWotever/SimHub/wiki/USB-Issues-Troubleshooting https://support.gomezsimindustries.com/portal/en/kb/articles/understanding-emi-and-grounding        https://www.reddit.com/r/simracing/comments/1n291hi/solution_for_simsonn_vam_pro_emi_issues/
